title: Hcoin (HCN) Smart Contract
sub_title: Focused on public chain digital notarization and tradable NFT-based digital evidence
description: A public blockchain contract based on Ethereum (ERC20) and multi-chain, designed to provide on-chain notarization for valuable digital evidence.
features_intro2: Begin your journey of on-chain certification
features_card1_desc: Any wallet compatible with ERC20 can receive, pay, and notarize.
add_to_wallet_tooltip: Please connect your wallet before attempting to add
